subject: Re: [junit] Can any friend tell me about how to simulate HttpServletRequest & HttpServeltResponse & HttpSenssion.
msgSnippet: ... If you take a look at the mock object library, you will find that we ve done these for you. Steve
messageBody:
FrankSun <franksun@...> said:
> I mean is if I should build mock for HttpServletResponse, HttpServeltRequest ..first, next do my unint test :)

If you take a look at the mock object library, you will find that we've done these for you.

Steve
